task.title: Creating an Account
task.shortdesc: How to set up an AirClassroom account so you can start booking today!

taskbody.context: To get started, you need an account first. It's simple & easy! Follow these instructions and you'll be good to go.

step.cmd: Provide us with your first and last name, along with your date of birth
Provide us with a valid email address

taskbody.result: After receiving this information from you, we will email you with a temporary username and password to use for your initial login.
taskbody.postreq: After logging in, you may change your username and password to whatever you like, and you're ready to book with AirClassroom! "That was easy!" - AirClassroom customers
